name: Lemonade in Space
description:
We did it, boys! Lemonade in Space is here! It wouldn't have been possible without griffpatch.

And I gotta give credit to all the Scratchers who submitted their small projects to the Lemonoids studio.

(P.S. There's controller support)

No Linux 32-bit, sorry!

Controls

Move - WASD, Arrows | Left Stick, D-Pad

Aim - Mouse | Right Stick

Primary (Shoot) - Left Click | Button 12 (RT), Button 1 (A)

Secondary (only works on Spark and Charge lasers) - Right Click | Button 11 (LT), Button 3 (X)

Switch Weapons - Q / E | Button 5 (LB) / Button 6 (RB)

OKAY, THIS GAME GOT A CRAP TON OF TWEAKING!

It went from version 1.0.0 ti version 1.0.3 is less than 2 days!
